title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 19 of 1993) and, in relation to
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Business Energy Use Survey)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Business Energy Use Survey) 

Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (business energy use survey) order 2024

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 19 of 1993) and, in relation to
heading: 2. (1) In these Regulations —
text_raw:
2. (1) In these Regulations — 

“Regulation” means Regulation (EC) No. 1099/2008 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 22 October 20081, as amended by 
Commission Regulation (EU) No. 844/2010 of 20 September 20102, 
Commission Regulation (EU) No. 147/2013 of 13 February 20133, 
Commission Regulation (EU) No. 431/2014 of 24 April 20144, Commission 
Regulation (EU) 2017/2010 of 9 November 20175, Commission Regulation 
(EU) 2019/2146 of 26 November 20196, and Commission Regulation (EU) 
2022/132 of 28 January 20227; 

“survey” means the Business Energy Use Survey that is conducted by the 
Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining information specified in 
the Schedule, including for the purposes of compliance with the Regulation, in 
so far as it relates to Annex B thereto. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, other than 
where the context otherwise requires.
text_norm: 2 (1) regulation -- regulation mean regulation (ec) no 1099 2008 european parliament council 22 october 20081 amended commission regulation (eu) no 844 2010 20 september 20102 commission regulation (eu) no 147 2013 13 february 20133 commission regulation (eu) no 431 2014 24 april 20144 commission regulation (eu) 2017 2010 9 november 20175 commission regulation (eu) 2019 2146 26 november 20196 commission regulation (eu) 2022 132 28 january 20227 survey mean business energy use survey conducted central statistic office purpose obtaining information specified schedule including purpose compliance regulation far relates annex b thereto (2) word expression used order also used regulation meaning order regulation context otherwise requires

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 19 of 1993) and, in relation to
heading: 3. This Order applies to a person who, or an undertaking that, is classified
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to a person who, or an undertaking that, is classified 
for statistical purposes under any section of NACE Rev. 2 set out in Annex I to 
Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 of the European Parliament and of the Council

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 19 of 1993) and, in relation to
heading: 4. A requirement on persons to whom, or undertakings to which, this
text_raw:
4. A requirement on persons to whom, or undertakings to which, this 
Order applies to provide, once only and for the purposes of the survey, 
information the general nature of which is specified in the Schedule in relation 
to each year in the period from 2023 to 2027, is hereby prescribed.
text_norm: 4 requirement person undertaking order applies provide purpose survey information general nature specified schedule relation year period 2023 2027 hereby prescribed

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 19 of 1993) and, in relation to
heading: 5. The Statistics (Business Energy Use Survey) Order 2018 (S.I. No. 509
text_raw:
5. The Statistics (Business Energy Use Survey) Order 2018 (S.I. No. 509 

of 2018) is revoked.

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 19 of 1993) and, in relation to
heading: Article 4

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 19 of 1993) and, in relation to
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to the business activity
text_raw:
1. 

Information regarding the following, as it relates to the business activity 
of the person or undertaking concerned, and specifying the year to which the 
information relates: 

(a) 

quantity of energy product used; 

(b) quantity of energy product purchased; 

(c) where self-generated electricity was produced, the quantity of 

the self-generated electricity by source.
text_norm: 1 information regarding following relates business activity person undertaking concerned specifying year information relates (a) quantity energy product used (b) quantity energy product purchased (c) self-generated electricity produced quantity self-generated electricity source

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 19 of 1993) and, in relation to
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to the business activity
text_raw:
2. 

Information regarding the following, as it relates to the business activity 
of the person or undertaking concerned, and specifying the year to which the 
information relates: 

(a) 

cost of energy product used; 

(b) 

cost of energy product purchased; 

(c) where self-generated electricity was produced, the value of the 

self-generated electricity; 

(d) 

(e) 

amount of self-generated electricity sold on the electricity grid, 
by quantity; 

amount of self-generated electricity sold on the electricity grid, 
by value.
text_norm: 2 information regarding following relates business activity person undertaking concerned specifying year information relates (a) cost energy product used (b) cost energy product purchased (c) self-generated electricity produced value self-generated electricity (d) (e) amount self-generated electricity sold electricity grid quantity amount self-generated electricity sold electricity grid value

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 19 of 1993) and, in relation to
heading: Information on the time taken by the person or undertaking concerned
text_raw:
3. 

Information on the time taken by the person or undertaking concerned 
to complete the questionnaire, form or other record prepared by the Director 
General for the collection of the information referred to in paragraphs 1 and 2. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 January, 2024. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach.
